name: Bloodrot
description:
A rogue group of soldiers turned mercenaries turned the world upside down with the Bloodrot Virus. The rest of your team, Bravo Squad has been killed. Barely escaping death, it's up to you to finish the mission of locating any secrets of the Bloodrot Virus. 

Instructions

Download, unzip, and launch the game!

  • Use WASD and Mouse to move
  • Shift to sprint
  • Press Space to jump
  • Press the Left mouse button to shoot your weapon
  • For the rifle, use the Right mouse button to zoom
  • You can use the Scrollwheel and numbers 1-3 to change guns

A game produced at APU by Jordan Oey.
